outputs.output_descr: The aim of this project is to support capacity development of the Institute of Peace and Conflict Studies (IPCS), Dar es Salaam, Tanzania to become a leading regional civilian peacekeeping, peace building and post conflict reconciliation and mediation centre in Eastern and Central Africa.  The project will build on previous achievements of human security in the Eastern and Central Africa area, and establish a self-sustaining, multifunctional institution in the region
